sys_script_include.name: URLShortener

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_1b532af69371021094e3f15a7bba104f
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1383184_charityb.URLShortener</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>URLShortener</name><script><![CDATA[var URLShortener = Class.create();
URLShortener.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    shortenURL: function(longURL) {
        var accessToken = "f0b3673cccd2956ce903f007f3d93a52ed8a5715";
        var apiUrl = "https://api-ssl.bitly.com/v4/shorten";
        //var apiUrl = "https://api-ssl.bitly.com/v4/bitlinks/bit.ly/12a4b6c";
        var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
        xhr.open("POST", apiUrl, true);
        xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
        xhr.setRequestHeader("Authorization", "Bearer " + accessToken);

        xhr.onreadystatechange = function() {
            if (xhr.readyState === 4 && xhr.status === 200) {
                var response = JSON.parse(xhr.responseText);
                var shortenedURL = response.link;
                // Update the form field with the shortened URL
                g_form.setValue("your_url_field", shortenedURL);
            }
        };

        var data = JSON.stringify({
            long_url: longURL,
            domain: "bit.ly"
        });

        xhr.send(data);
    },

    type: 'URLShortener'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>christy</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-30 05:16:18</sys_created_on><sys_id>1b532af69371021094e3f15a7bba104f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>URLShortener</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CharityBids" source="x_1383184_charityb">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="CharityBids">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1b532af69371021094e3f15a7bba104f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>christy</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-30 09:13:36</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
